option.name: modelData
option.value: <ColumnAlignerModel> <option name="added" /> <option name="alignBy" value="VALUES" /> <option name="columnSortOrder" value="" /> <option name="keepLeadingIndent" value="true" /> <option name="maxSeparatorsPerLine" value="4" /> <option name="sbcCaseWorkaround" value="false" /> <option name="separators"> <list> <option value=" " /> <option value=" " /> </list> </option> <option name="sequentialProcessing" value="false" /> <option name="skipFirstRow" value="false" /> <option name="sortOnly" value="false" /> <option name="sortSettings"> <SortSettings> <option name="baseComparator" value="NATURAL" /> <option name="collatorLanguageTag" value="fr_FR" /> <option name="groupClosingLineRegex" value="^[\s]*[)\]}],?[\s]*$" /> <option name="groupClosingLineRegexEnabled" value="true" /> <option name="groupSeparatorRegex" value="(^[\s]*$|^---.*$)" /> <option name="hierarchicalSort" value="false" /> <option name="ignoreLeadingSpaces" value="true" /> <option name="jsonSort" value="false" /> <option name="levelRegex" value="^[\s]+" /> <option name="preserveLeadingSpaces" value="true" /> <option name="preserveTrailingSpecialCharacters" value="false" /> <option name="sortByGroups" value="false" /> <option name="sortType" value="CASE_INSENSITIVE_A_Z" /> <option name="trailingChars" value=",;" /> </SortSettings> </option> <option name="spaceAfterSeparator" value="true" /> <option name="spaceBeforeSeparator" value="true" /> <option name="trimLines" value="false" /> <option name="trimValues" value="true" /> </ColumnAlignerModel>
